channel.title: CVE Feed for GNOME -- gdm
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GNOME -- gdm

item.title: CVE-2017-12164|2024-08-05T18:28:16.573Z -- gnome -- gdm
item.description: A flaw was discovered in gdm 3.24.1 where gdm greeter was no longer setting the ran_once boolean during autologin. If autologin was enabled for a victim, an attacker could simply select 'login as another user' to unlock their screen.
